title: Grapevine: Shearer named NVC assistant superintendent, VP
content: Erik Shearer of Napa, who attended local schools, taught college for 18 years and became interim vice president for instruction at Napa Valley College three years ago, is NVC’s new assistant superintendent and vice president of academic affairs.      “Serving the students, faculty, and staff of Napa Valley College has been one of the greatest joys of my life,” said Shearer. “I cherish this opportunity to continue my service to our community in this new role.”         Get tips on free stuff and fun ideas delivered weekly to your inbox
